posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
We‚Äôre releasing the Signal 7.36 beta soon. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta group here . If you‚Äôd like to get releases even faster, try out Obtainium!

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

No new notes! Mostly behind-the-scenes stuff, with a good dose of bug fixes from generous external contributors :)

Complete list of new commits since 7.35.0
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.35.0‚Ä¶main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Get the latest Android releases even faster with Obtainium
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.35 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.36.0 (151700)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

24 new commits since 7.35.0:

Show commits

  • Update to RingRTC v2.50.0 [1]

  • Fix validation error with long text attachments. [2]

  • Ensure that pinned_order is unique. [3]

  • Update donation string. [4]

  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md to remove references to submodules. [5]

    Resolves #14013

  • Fix read more text for certain text lengths. [6]

    Fixes #14017

  • Fix potential missing recipient crash in profile fetch. [7]

  • Update to the latest backup.proto [8]

  • Bump libsignal to v0.67.0. [9]

    Enables new CDSI connection logic based on remote config.

  • Do regv3 storage service restore flows right. [10]

  • Fix pni in aci only field of decline invite for backupv2. [11]

  • Fix backup export of call link admin key. [12]

  • Separate placeholder transitions for profile names. [13]

  • Inline link+sync remote config. [14]

  • Fix some media not appearing in the gallery picker. [15]

    Works around the glide issue by using the straight URI when possible,
    which allows glide to not have to keep a buffer. However, as soon as you
    select it, it'll be an encrypted file, and we'll run into this same
    issue where glide needs to keep a buffer for the input stream.
    Related to #11014

  • Fix stripe canceled subscriptions from showing on management screen. [16]

  • Update currently selected members count properly. [17]

    Fixes #13857
    Fixes #13859
    Resolves #13885

  • Update logcat logging. [18]

  • Don't send edits if the message text wasn't changed. [19]

  • Fix possible storage service retry loop. [20]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.67.1. [21]

  • Update translations and other static files. [22]

  • Update baseline profile. [23]

  • Bump version to 7.36.0 [24]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.35.0‚Ä¶v7.36.0

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked: No longer can edit-out a quote reply from a message.

posts.name: anon53652
posts.cooked: I can‚Äôt reproduce that or we mean different things. When I quote message the little x in the right corner to remove the quote workd for me.

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Bug where video disappears if you send it fast persists. In this case it failed then when I clicked retry it disappeared.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.36.0/5809565c3158a4176e492a2738a71ab9ba67fba276311ad9b26a703bb647e5d9

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked:
I got another ‚Äúyou might have new messages‚Äù notification, but there were no new messages.

Log

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.36.0/3847ba0aea9040765379e6e9bf82eb2728ca091cdc2cee301b913c5d8aab3c29

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: Just noticed a minor bug but when you export a username QR code, the file it exports as is called SignalGroupQr.png.

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
Xashyar:

No longer can edit-out a quote reply from a message.

Ahh, unintended consequence of fixing a different bug. Will fix, thanks!

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Was trying to read this debug log where someone had a message delay for 8 minutes: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.35.0/1ca48c20b5fe14ce7b7913ad8dd8f103ee6475d70f673b2cf7e926ca69b78126

But there‚Äôs a problem, where‚Äôs debuglogs.app?? Is it gone now?

New Version: 7.36.1 (151800)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

7 new commits since 7.36.0:

  • Add log for 'you may have new messages' notification. [1]

  • Trim contact seach queries. [2]

    Fixes #14032

  • Fix ability to remove quoted message without changing message text. [3]

    Fixes a bug introduced in ff09d2267bb5ba41791b39fad8e0eba1dc3ad3ae that prevented removing a quoted message when the message text is unchanged.

  • Ensure parent window token is non-null before trying to display Wifi popup. [4]

  • Update translations and other static files. [5]

  • Update baseline profile. [6]

  • Bump version to 7.36.1 [7]

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
greyson-signal:

Ahh, unintended consequence of fixing a different bug. Will fix, thanks!

May I add one further note that the same thing happens, with mark-up edits? When your edits only contain strikethroughs, etc. but if you add characters in your edits they apply.

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
Whatnoww:

But there‚Äôs a problem, where‚Äôs debuglogs.app??

Whoops! I recently switched VPS providers and forgot to copy it over. I‚Äôve set it back up, just gotta wait for DNS settings to propagate, should be working again in a few hours

Xashyar:

When your edits only contain strikethroughs, etc. but if you add characters in your edits they apply.

Yikes, fixing that in the next release, thank you!

New Version: 7.36.2 (151900)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

5 new commits since 7.36.1:

  • Fix improper usage of stale data object. [1]

  • Fix edit message logic when only changing formatting. [2]

  • IAP Resolve and synchronize payment method from subscription object. [3]

  • Update translations and other static files. [4]

  • Bump version to 7.36.2 [5]

link_counts.title: Get the latest Android releases even faster with Firebase App Distribution
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.37 release

posts.cooked:
Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.37 release.
